data.text: @RachelBitecofer @westcoastsal @KimReynoldsIA 31 out of 50.  That’s really a case of the math not mathing.  Not even by common core standards.

@RachelBitecofer @DevinCow @KimReynoldsIA Hi Rachel! I'm rebuilding for tweets about Boebert and MTG, which were true. I want to do everything I can to support democracy. I want to defeat Trumpism and the GQP. Thank you again for all you do!!!

@actnowforward @GDW001 @Renew2O22 @RachelBitecofer @KimReynoldsIA This has been the case for all communities since the dawn of time. There are and have always been vulnerable people and we didn’t mask kids for years.

@actnowforward @GDW001 @Renew2O22 @RachelBitecofer @KimReynoldsIA And wearing a paper towel over face is better than nothing but that doesn’t mean they are meaningfully effective or are worth wearing compared to the other harms caused by masking kids for YEARS.
@Justinredalen @GDW001 @Renew2O22 @RachelBitecofer @KimReynoldsIA A lot of if's.  All communities have vulnerable, high risk populations susceptible to community spread.
@Justinredalen @GDW001 @Renew2O22 @RachelBitecofer @KimReynoldsIA Thus, procedures like dental work and intubating patients are high risk and necessitate N95 masks.

@Justinredalen @GDW001 @Renew2O22 @RachelBitecofer @KimReynoldsIA Cloth masks are not worthless, they are just not as effective as N95 masks. Not everyone needs an N95 mask.  The need is based on duration of contact, ventilation, viral load of the infected person, whether the other person is masked.
@actnowforward @GDW001 @Renew2O22 @RachelBitecofer @KimReynoldsIA Because influenza is far less transmissible than covid.
